scripts.build: vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); try { fs.copyFileSync('public/_redirects', 'dist/_redirects'); } catch(e) { console.error(e); } fs.copyFileSync('dist/index.html', 'dist/404.html'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/.nojekyll', ''); const copyDir = (src, dest) => { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); const entries = fs.readdirSync(src, { withFileTypes: true }); for(let entry of entries) { const srcPath = path.join(src, entry.name); const destPath = path.join(dest, entry.name); if (entry.isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } } }; try { copyDir('images', 'dist/images'); console.log('Successfully copied images folder to dist'); } catch(e) { console.error('Error copying images folder:', e); }"
